title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official CLI and Python/JavaScript libraries for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally with GPU acceleration.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official PyPI package providing Python bindings to communicate with the Ollama server and run models programmatically.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official npm package offering JavaScript/TypeScript bindings for the Ollama REST API, usable in Node or browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain community integration that wraps Ollama models as standard LangChain LLMs for chaining, agents, and retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama, featuring chat history, model switching, and multi-user support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama, exposing synchronous and asynchronous APIs for embedding and completion endpoints.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed bindings to the Ollama REST API with tokio-based async support.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Visual Studio Code extension that adds local AI code completion powered by Ollama models.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama and selected models on Kubernetes clusters with GPU node support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images and compose examples for running Ollama containers with CUDA or CPU-only backends.

title: ollama-reddit
summary: Subreddit dedicated to sharing tips, model recommendations, troubleshooting, and ecosystem updates for Ollama users.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration enabling Ollama models as generators or embedders in production-ready retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app template that connects to Ollama and adds file upload, prompt history, and model selection widgets.

title: ollama-hnswlib-rag
summary: Lightweight RAG example using Ollama embeddings, hnswlib vector search, and any local LLM for question answering.

title: ollama-dotnet
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with support for chat, completion, and embedding endpoints in C# and F# applications.

title: ollama-cli-chat
summary: Terminal UI chat client written in Go that supports multi-line prompts, conversation history, and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-model-hub
summary: Community-curated list of custom Ollama Modelfiles for popular open-source LLMs and fine-tunes not in the default library.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that lets users query local Ollama models from within notes for summarization or idea generation.
